languages.text: "Во втором ряду — три офицера, в чьи обязанности входит надзор за важнейшими функциями корабля. Мастер орудий, отвечает за артиллерию. Инфернус-мастер, чья служба руководит предотвращением и тушением пожаров на корабле. И, наконец, Мастер двигателя, служительница {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Во втором ряду — три офицера, в чьи обязанности входит надзор за важнейшими функциями корабля. Ашар Найталломо — Мастер орудий, отвечает за артиллерию. Файсал Нальци — Инфернус-мастер, чья служба руководит предотвращением и тушением пожаров на корабле. И Зи-Ра Таллар, Мастер двигателя".

languages.text: "In the second row, we have the three officers charged with overseeing the ship's vital functions. The Master of Ordnance is responsible for the artillery aboard. The Infernus Master, whose crew work to prevent and extinguish fires on the ship. And, lastly, the Drivesmaster, servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."
languages.original_text: "Во втором ряду — три офицера, в чьи обязанности входит надзор за важнейшими функциями корабля. Мастер орудий, отвечает за артиллерию. Инфернус-мастер, чья служба руководит предотвращением и тушением пожаров на корабле. И, наконец, Мастер двигателя, служительница {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "In the second row, we have the three officers charged with overseeing the ship's vital functions. The Master of Ordnance is responsible for the artillery aboard. The Infernus Master, whose crew work to prevent and extinguish fires on the ship. And, lastly, the Engine Master, servant of the Omnissiah."

"In the second row, we have the three officers charged with overseeing the ship's vital functions. The Master of Ordnance is responsible for the artillery aboard. The Infernus Master, whose crew work to prevent and extinguish fires on the ship. And, lastly, the Engine Master, servant of the Omnissiah."

"In the second row, we have the three officers charged with overseeing the ship's vital functions. The Master of Ordnance is responsible for the artillery aboard. The Infernus Master, whose crew work to prevent and extinguish fires on the ship. And, lastly, the Engine Master, servant of the Omnissiah."

"In the second row, we have the three officers charged with overseeing the ship's vital functions. The Master of Ordnance is responsible for the artillery aboard. The Infernus Master, whose crew work to prevent and extinguish fires on the ship. And, lastly, the Drivesmaster, servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."

languages.text: “第二排的三位军官负责管理这艘船的核心功能。军械大师负责管理这艘飞船的火炮，控火大师与他的人手负责防治船上的火灾，而最后这位驱动大师，则是{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的仆人。”
languages.original_text: "In the second row, we have the three officers charged with overseeing the ship's vital functions. The Master of Ordnance is responsible for the artillery aboard. The Infernus Master, whose crew work to prevent and extinguish fires on the ship. And, lastly, the Drivesmaster, servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."

traits.locale_text: “第二排的三位军官负责管理这艘船的核心功能。军械大师负责管理这艘飞船的火炮，火控大师与他的人手负责防治船上的火灾，而最后这位引擎大师，则是{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的仆人。”

languages.text: 「2列目には、船の重要な機能を監督する3人の士官がいます。マスター・オヴ・オードナンスは艦内の砲を管理をおこなっています。インフェルヌス・マスターは、艦内の火災の予防と消火にあたります。そして最後に、{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}に仕える運転長です」
languages.original_text: "In the second row, we have the three officers charged with overseeing the ship's vital functions. The Master of Ordnance is responsible for the artillery aboard. The Infernus Master, whose crew work to prevent and extinguish fires on the ship. And, lastly, the Drivesmaster, servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."

traits.locale_text: 「2列目には、船の重要な機能を監督する3人の士官がいます。マスター・オヴ・オードナンスは艦内の砲を管理をおこなっています。インフェルヌス・マスターは、艦内の火災の予防と消火にあたります。そして最後に、{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}に仕える機関長です」

languages.text: "In der zweiten Reihe seht Ihr die drei Offiziere, die die Vitalfunktionen des Schiffs beaufsichtigen. Der Artillerieoffizier ist verantwortlich für die Geschütze an Bord. Die Crew des Infernus-Meisters verhindert und löscht Brände auf dem Schiff. Und schließlich die Triebwerksmeisterin, Dienerin des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."
languages.original_text: "In the second row, we have the three officers charged with overseeing the ship's vital functions. The Master of Ordnance is responsible for the artillery aboard. The Infernus Master, whose crew work to prevent and extinguish fires on the ship. And, lastly, the Drivesmaster, servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "In der zweiten Reihe seht Ihr die drei Offiziere, die die Vitalfunktionen des Schiffs beaufsichtigen. Der Artillerieoffizier ist verantwortlich für die Geschütze an Bord. Die Crew des Infernus-Meisters verhindert und löscht Brände auf dem Schiff. Und schließlich die Triebwerksmeisterin, Dienerin des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."

languages.text: « Au deuxième rang se trouvent les trois officiers chargés de superviser les fonctions vitales du vaisseau. Le maître de l'artillerie, responsable de l'armement à bord. Le maître-infernus, dont les équipes s'efforcent de prévenir et d'éteindre les incendies dans le vaisseau. Et pour finir, la maîtresse des machines, fidèle de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "In the second row, we have the three officers charged with overseeing the ship's vital functions. The Master of Ordnance is responsible for the artillery aboard. The Infernus Master, whose crew work to prevent and extinguish fires on the ship. And, lastly, the Drivesmaster, servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « Au deuxième rang se trouvent les trois officiers chargés de superviser les fonctions vitales du vaisseau. Le maître de l'artillerie, responsable de l'armement à bord. Le maître-infernus, dont les équipes s'efforcent de prévenir et d'éteindre les incendies à bord du vaisseau. Et pour finir, la maîtresse des machines, fidèle de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}. »

languages.text: «En segunda fila tenemos a los tres oficiales encargados de la supervisión de las funciones vitales de la nave. El Señor de la Artillería es el responsable del armamento de a bordo. El maestro de Infernus dirige la tripulación dedicada a la extinción de fuegos en la nave. Por último, la maestra de motores, sirviente del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}».
languages.original_text: "In the second row, we have the three officers charged with overseeing the ship's vital functions. The Master of Ordnance is responsible for the artillery aboard. The Infernus Master, whose crew work to prevent and extinguish fires on the ship. And, lastly, the Drivesmaster, servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."

traits.locale_text: «En segunda fila tenemos a los tres oficiales encargados de la supervisión de las funciones vitales de la nave. El Señor de la Artillería es el responsable del armamento de a bordo. El maestro de Infernus dirige la tripulación dedicada a la extinción de fuegos en la nave. Por último, la maestra de motores, sirviente del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}».

languages.text: "İkinci sırada, geminin hayati işlevlerini denetlemekle görevli üç subay var. İlki Mühimmat Üstadı, gemideki ağır silahlardan sorumludur. İtfa Üstadı ve ekibi, gemideki yangınları önlemek ve söndürmekten mesuldür. Son subay da {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih'in{/g} hizmetindeki Motor Üstadı'dır."
languages.original_text: "In the second row, we have the three officers charged with overseeing the ship's vital functions. The Master of Ordnance is responsible for the artillery aboard. The Infernus Master, whose crew work to prevent and extinguish fires on the ship. And, lastly, the Drivesmaster, servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "İkinci sırada, geminin hayati işlevlerini denetlemekle görevli üç subay var. İlki Mühimmat Üstadı, gemideki ağır silahlardan sorumludur. İtfa Üstadı ve ekibi, gemideki yangınları önlemek ve söndürmekten mesuldür. Son subay da {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g}'in hizmetindeki Motor Üstadı'dır."
